Golf & Wine Legends Set
class3.description:
The perfect collection for wine and golf lovers. Three premium wines from the wineries of legendary golfers Arnold Palmer, Greg Norman and Ernie Els are paired with a sleeve of three golf balls. This collection is truly par excellence!

Wine Set Includes:

  • Arnold Palmer Cabernet Sauvignon
    The late golf legend Arnold Palmer, in collaboration with Luna Vineyards, had expanded his portfolio of privately branded offerings to include Arnold Palmer Wines. This is a classic California Cab - rich, smooth, and tasty!

  • Greg Norman Limestone Coast Shiraz
    Fine wine is one of Greg Norman's great passions, and Australian wine in particular. This passion and curiosity led him to launch Greg Norman Estates, a collection of wines from his native Australia. From the beginning, I have been committed to the promise that every bottle of my wine delivers exceptional quality and value.

  • Ernie Els Big Easy Red Blend
    Ernie Els is a true connoisseur of South Africa's finest wines, and with a dedication to excellence, on and off the course, Els founded Ernie Els Winery in 1999, crushing its first vintage in 2000. His Stellenbosch winery receives acclaim and accolades every vintage for the range of quality wines produced.

  • Sleeve of three Wine.com logo golf balls

  • Printed insert that describes the featured wines

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

class3.name: Hoppier Place Powder To The People
class3.description: We brewed this latest batch of Hoppier Place with lupulin powder. Intense hop flavor and aroma, amazing mouthfeel, just the right amount of bitterness...Powder to the People! Engage in an over-the-top hop experience….your Hoppier Place has been found.

Moscato and Tempting Treats
class3.description:
This gift is a special treat! Sweet Moscato accompanies Ghirardelli chocolate, delicious water crackers, and parmesan peppercorn cheese.

Le Colture Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore di Cartizze
Domaine Saint Prefert Isabel Ferrando Chateauneuf-du-Pape Colombis 2014
Quintessential Whites Wine Collection
class3.description:
This six-bottle set showcases the quintessential white varietals of the premier wine producing regions of the world. These wines exemplify the signature grape varieties of their respective regions.

White Wine Set Includes:
  • Austria: Domäne Wachau Federspiel Terrassen Grüner Veltliner
    A typical Grüner Veltliner, this wine is medium bodied with a crisp acidity, very balanced and spicy in the finish. Subtle and racy, with enticing aromas of white pepper, gooseberry and hints of ripe apple.
  • California: Angeline Reserve Chardonnay
    This Chardonnay from California's Central Coast features ripe, juicy pear and apple, along with buttered toast and white flowers.
  • South Africa: Tania et Vincent Careme Terre Brulee Chenin Blanc
    This Chenin Blanc is a luxurious bottling offers notes of honeysuckle and citrus which are balanced by a bright, seamless acidity.
  • New Zealand: Giesen Sauvignon Blanc
    The fruit and aroma spectrum shows a greater depth of tropical notes with elderflower, kaffir lime leaf, pink grapefruit and dried herb.
  • Italy: Santa Cristina by Antinori Pinot Grigio
    This Pinot Grigio shows delicate aromas of orange flowers, bananas and tropical fruit. On the palate, the flavors are savory, refreshing and contain notes that recall the fruit first felt on the nose.
  • Spain: Condes de Albarei Albariño
    This Albariño from notable producer, Ramon Bilbao, is an exceptional, bright and aromatic wine with sumptuous flavors of tropical fruit, citrus and melons, with a mineral finish.

VIP Gourmet Gift Basket
class3.description:
We filled this basket to the brim with superb goodies. Godiva chocolates, butter rich cookies, caramel popcorn, smoked salmon, and much more. We've got you covered! Perfect for a VIP at the office or a VIP at home. And to top it all off, we've tied it up with a hand-made festive bow.

class3.name: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars S.L.V. Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
Lips of Faith - Kick
class3.description:
New Belgium and Elysian are together again with Kick, a rich and tart pumpkin cranberry ale blended with wood-aged beer for a uniquely complex harvest season sour. The russet and orange of autumn shimmer through a slight haze like sunlight through the smoke from burning leaves. The taste and texture of pumpkin give way to the refreshing tang of cranberries and critters, satisfying and exciting with each swallow, finishing with an urge for more. 

Kim brought sour from New Belgium; Dick brought pumpkin from Elysian. You'll get a Kick out of their collaboration.

class3.name: Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande (Futures Pre-Sale) 2015
Betelgeuse
class3.description: Red Giant Belgian-style Ale; oak-aged for 9 months.

class3.name: Domaine Daniel Rion & Fils Nuits-St-Georges Les Hauts Pruliers 1er Cru 2014
Trip V
class3.description: Trip V delivers the comfort of cocoa and vanilla with a bold cherry twist. Bolstered by chocolate and caramel malts, this beer pours dark, reddish brown. New Belgium Brewer Andrew Sturm decided to go big with all three spices but achieved balance through a moderate amount of bittering hops. The result is a satisfying blend of chocolate, cherry, and vanilla delivered on a sophisticated bed of hops and alcohol.

class3.name: DAOU Vineyards Soul of a Lion 2013
Darioush Signature Cabernet Sauvignon (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2013

Tour de France Wine Trio
class3.description:
Take a tour through France and discover three great wines from the Old World – a Pinot Noir, a Bordeaux, and a Rhône Blend. Each wine is chosen to display the unique characteristics of the region it represents: a fruity yet spicy Bouchard Aîné & Fils Pinot Noir from the south of France, a bold Bordeaux from Château Les Graves de Barrau, and a spicy Grenache and Syrah blend from Louis Bernard in the Côtes-du-Rhône. Passport not required.

Wine Set Includes:
  • Bordeaux Red: Château Les Graves de Barrau
    Displaying dark ruby colors, with aromas of blackcurrant, cherry and just a hint of vanilla, this wine is medium-bodied with dark berry flavors, well-balanced tannins and a long, smooth finish.
  • Pinot Noir: Bouchard Aîné & Fils
    This Pinot Noir delivers bright cherry fruits, sweet spice and a hint of oak. The soft and smooth finish brings you back for more.
  • Rhône Valley Blend: Louis Bernard Côtes-du-Rhône
    Cherry red color with concentrated berries and cherries on the nose, this wine has ample fruit, with a gentle hint of oak. An excellent match for barbeque.

class3.name: Riedel Flirt Decanter
class3.description:
Riedel decanters combine sophistication and elegance with optimal shapes for aeration. Decanting old wines, just a few moments before they are served, helps to ensure that the wine's clarity and brilliance are not obscured by any deposit that may have developed over time. Decanting young wines several hours before they are served gives the wine a chance to bloom and attain a stage of development that normally requires years of aging.

The Riedel Flirt Decanter is leek, elegant, and alluring. This decanter has a tilted shape that will look great in any room. Using tested and tried aeration methods, it oxygenates and enhances the flavors and aromas of red wines. A thumb-sized print is found at the base of the decanter to offer ergonomic pouring. The decanter stands 13 3/4" high, and holds 1,760ML/62 oz. Made from 24% lead crystal.

Wine sold separately.

See other Riedel Decanters

Attention California residents. Proposition 65 warning: Consuming foods or beverages that have been kept or served in leaded crystal products or handling products made of leaded crystal will expose you to lead, a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm.

Promotional code discounts do not apply to this product.

class3.name: Silver Oak Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon (3 Liter Bottle) 2012
Raptor Ridge Shea Vineyard Pinot Noir 2014
Chateau Cheval Blanc Le Petit Cheval Bordeaux Blanc 2014
Le Grand Courtage Rose And Blanc de Blancs Brut Duo
class3.description:
Meaning "the great courtship", the Le Grand Courtage is a duo of fine French sparkling wines truly meant for celebrating life's greatest moments. Whether serving at an event or sending as a birthday gift to a loved one, these easy sipping sparklers will truly delight any palate. In fact, their motto is appropriately 'Embrace Life. Dream Big. Accept all Invitations.'

Wine Gift Includes:

  • Le Grand Courtage Blanc de Blancs Brut:
    The perfect 'celebratory' wine, the palate is a harmonious balance of fruit, acidity & sweetness. With lemon, honeydew, and apple flavors that seemingly never end, this fresh bubbly is a versatile accompaniment to any cuisine or cocktail. Try this wine with savory hors d'oeuvers, buttered popcorn, seafood, creamy pasta dishes, fried chicken, spicy Asian cuisine, fruit based desserts, or semi-soft cheeses.
    Blend: Chardonnay imparts depth and complexity for the overall balance while Chenin Blanc lends citrus and hints of honey for a creamy texture. Colombard's higher acidity provides structure, length and a pleasant minerality that is supplemented by the Ugni Blanc's fruit profile.

  • Le Grand Courtage Rose Brut:
    A deliciously seductive rose, just a sip of this fruity, and balanced bubbly will leave you wanting more! Aromas of young strawberry, raspberry and notes of lilac and violets lead into a palate packed full of fresh and fruity flavors. Pair this beauty with spicy Asian dishes, risotto, BBQ, beef, lamb, duck, game, chicken, prosciutto, seafood, pizza or soft cheese (like brie or goat).
    The Blend: The light bodied Gamay provides vibrant youthful fruit expressions reminiscent of wild berries and flowers amongst the French countryside on a warm summer day. The Chardonnay provides a depth and structure to the wine, while the Ugni Blanc offers a natural acidity and freshness.

    Due to the popularity of this gift, vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage.

class3.name: Italian Wine Trio
class3.description:
Italy is one of the most diverse wine growing regions in Europe. Take a tour through Italy's wine regions as you sample the varietals that have become hallmarks of Italian wine. This trio includes a light and crisp Pinot Grigio from Veneto, a juicy red from Tuscany and a spicy Nero d'Avola from Sicily.

Wine Gift Trio Includes:

  • Banfi Le Rime Pinot Grigio:
    America's favorite Italian white wine! Cool, crisp and vibrant. The perfect glass of wine for any occasion. Whether you are relaxing with friends or at home after a hard day's work, Banfi's Le Rime Pinot Grigio brings you the passion of Italy in every bottle.

  • Frescobaldi Castiglioni Chianti:
    Castiglioni Chianti is a deep ruby red with purplish highlights. Notes of small red-berry fruits like mulberry and currant insinuate themselves on the nose, while the ripe plum is perfectly in tune with fragrant floral notes. The palate is smooth, warm and elegantly balanced. Long and persistent, with a lightly spicy finish.

  • Cusumano Nero d'Avola:
    Deep red color with violet reflections. Pleasant scents of brambly red berry fruits lead to a harmonious and rounded palate. This is an elegant and concentrated red, with delicious ripe fruit and a pronounced character.

  • Printed insert that describes the featured wines

    Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

Alfaro Family Lindsay Paige Vineyard Chardonnay 2014

The Prisoner Wine Company The Prisoner 2015
Bubbles and Godiva Gift Set
class3.description:
Bubbles and chocolate come together for an incredible celebration. This gift includes a bottle of the refreshing Luc Belaire Brut and elegant Godiva Chocolates. This Brut has aromas of white flowers and a fruit-forward flavor profile of citrus and stone fruits, such as peach, grapefruit, and lemon. In the mouth, the wine is dry and light, with a crisp finish. Beautifully packaged, the Godiva 8-piece Gold Ballotin includes a variety of milk, dark, and white chocolates with classic Belgian fillings such as silky ganaches, creamy pralines, rich caramels, fruits, and nuts.

class3.name: Quinta de la Rosa Vintage Port (375ML half-bottle) 2011
Battlecat Stout
class3.description: Big roast, big hops, big alcohol, and somehow balanced.  Prominent aromas of chocolate and coffee give way to a sturdy hop bitterness, and citrusy American hop flavors. Full bodied with a pleasant roasted barley finish. *** 2013 GABF Silver Medal for American Stout***

class3.name: Papier
class3.description: Papier is our first anniversary ale, loosely brewed in the English-style Old Ale tradition using our house Belgian yeast strain. The traditional first anniversary gift is something made of paper. The Bruery is giving their loyal fans the gift of Papier, their first anniversary ale. Layered with complex flavors of dark fruit,vanilla, oak, and burnt sugar, Papier is a robust ale, surely the perfect beer to mark our first big milestone. Best for sharing, this beer is ideal for cellaring until you have a celebration of your own…if you can wait.

class3.name: Peter Michael Ma Danseuse Pinot Noir 2014
Mother of all Storms
class3.description: There are many storms out there, all of them perfect in their own way. But there is only one Mother of all Storms and it only happens in Pacific City, Oregon. Based on Stormwatcher’s Winterfest, our English-style barleywine, Mother of all Storms spent many months aging in Kentucky bourbon barrels. Now at its peak, Mother of all Storms delivers deep flavors of toasted malt, bourbon and oak. The finish rewards with whispers of vanilla, toffee and caramel. Best enjoyed with gusts exceeding 60 mph.

class3.name: Clarendon Hills Astralis Syrah 6 Pack OWC
class3.description:
The pride of our portfolio, Clarendon Hills Astralis Syrah has a deep black-purple crimson color that alludes to its aromas of boysenberry, forest floor and Asian spice and flavors ripe blackberry. An overall full-bodied wine, the Astralis is softened by silky tannins and a mouth-engulfing structure that sails on seamlessly to a long, lingering finish.
Original Wooden Case (OWC) may ship in a separate box from the wine.

class3.name: RuinTen IPA
class3.description: We first released this decidedly indelicate beer in 2012, as Stone Ruination Tenth Anniversary IPA, to celebrate the 10th anniversary of our belovedly bitter Stone Ruination IPA. Stone RuinTen IPA uses the same recklessly hoppy recipe as the 2012 release; only the name has changed, as we plan to unleash this belligerently delicious hop monster upon the public annually from now on. We packed a whopping five pounds of hops into each barrel, and cranked up the ABV to stand up to the hop onslaught. The results are glorious, and we know you'll rejoice in tasting this audacious gem of hoppy splendor once again. You're welcome.

class3.name: Wines That Rock Trio
class3.description:
Welcome to a revolution in wine, Wines that Rock!

As passionate wine lovers and die-hard music fans, Wines That Rock is creating its own category in the wine industry - "Great Tasting Wines Inspired by Music." With classic tracks blasting in the cellar, winemaker Mark Beaman crafted custom wines for each of these legendary artists and their timeless albums - blending one-of-a-kind wines with Rock 'n Roll mythology. The back labels are set up just like the back of the album jacket, liner notes and all. These are tapestries from the rock vault, with classic, iconic album art. Hail, Hail Rock and Roll! Additionally, coming out of Mendocino County, the award winning vineyard leads the pack in environmental leadership with sustainable farming, 100% green power, eco-friendly packaging and carbon neutrality.

Wine Set Includes:
  • Wines That Rock Rolling Stones Forty Licks Merlot
    Forty Licks Merlot was created with the Rolling Stones album of the same name blasting. It is loaded with flavors of raspberry and black cherry, with a vanilla finish.
  • Wines That Rock Grateful Dead Red Blend
    With the tunes of The Grateful Dead dancing through the cellar, this red blend was crafted with distinctive flavors of black cherries, peppered bacon and caramel on the palate.
  • Wines That Rock The Police Synchronicity Red Wine Blend
    With the Police turned up to maximum volume, this Synchronicity red wine blend was made with touches of juicy strawberry on the palate with a lush lingering finish.

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

class3.name: Insanely Bad Elf
class3.description:
“My goodness”, muttered Claus, recalling his visit to the Institute, “the restrictive outerwear, the padded room-even padded Christmas tree ornaments. Horrifying! Yet the little chap seems happier than he’s ever been” Claus took a thoughtful sip of a most warming red ale. “Perhaps sanity is over-rated…Ho,Ho,Ho!”
A dark flavo(u)r bomb of a beer. It backs such a punch that it is only available in 330 ml bottles.

class3.name: Orin Swift Cellars Palermo Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
90+ Point Cabernet Trio
class3.description:
This collection includes three of our favorite 90+ point rated Cabernet Sauvignon wines from around the globe. The trio offers top-notch Cabs from Washington State, Australia and Chile. It's a great way for any Cabernet lover to taste a variety of stunning examples of this classic varietal.

Wine Gift Set Includes:

  • Seven Falls 2013 Wahluke Slope Cabernet Sauvignon
    Ripe black cherry and boysenberry fruit flavors are layered with notes of caramel, mocha and black tea. This concentrated, full bodied wine has a smooth lasting finish.An elegant, complex wine with a deep ruby red color. The nose shows aromas of red fruits with light notes of chocolate and orange rind. The mouthfeel is full and well structured, with sweet spice and vanilla notes from French oak aging, and soft, finely grained tannins with excellent length.
    Rated 90 Points: Wine Enthusiast Magazine

  • Jim Barry Cover Drive Cabernet Sauvignon (2013 or 2014 vintage)

    Deep garnet in color with high clarity. The nose is very aromatic, displaying characters of cassis, cedar, black currant and hints of dried herbs. The palate is medium bodied and generous, showing fine tannins, highlighted by flavors of boysenberry, menthol and morello cherries.
    2014 Rated 91 Points: Wine & Spirits Magazine
    2013 Rated 90 Points Robert Parker's, The Wine Advocate

  • Concha y Toro 2014 Marques de Casa Concha Cabernet Sauvignon

    Marques de Casa Concha, is dark ruby red in color with luscious aromas of cherry and blackberries intertwined with cedar and smoke. These notes follow through to the palate. Tremendously concentrated flavors are revealed in firm tannins with a soft, silky texture and a lingering finish.
    Rated 92 Points: James Suckling

    Due to the popularity of this gift, wines sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with wines of equal or greater value.
